Text: Even if its not perfect I'll say thanks for the honest effort. If your going to complain about the quality of something then maybe you should take an HD camcorder into a theater and make us a R5 quality copy?

in all honesty, to me it seems like most samples are worse than the actual rip of the whole movie. Check the full download before judging just from a sample ;-) thanks for the upload! Greatly appreciated!
